vclaim: A video shows six Antifa members beating up an individual during an August 2018 alt-right protest in Washington D.C.
title: Does This Video Show Six Antifa Members Beating Up a Person During an August 2018 Rally?
subtitle: A year-old video showing a group of Antifascists beating up a right-wing activists in Berkeley, California, was reshared as if it showed a recent incident in Washington D.C.
author: Dan Evon
